integration_patterns: Real-time Data Integration with Apache Kafka

evidence.claim: ACI Federal utilizes AWS cloud services for robust infrastructure and HIPAA compliance.
The company implements FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange, ensuring interoperability.
ACI Federal is equipped to handle X12 EDI transaction sets, crucial for healthcare billing processes.

icp.icp_reason: Potential to engage in X12 transactions and API-driven healthcare data exchange.
